items.strItemName: Blade of the Shattered Dream VIII
items.strItemDescription: Discovered in the temple of the ancient abyss, this weapon is adorned with the visage of a long forgotten Abyssal hero. Despite everything, this weapon somehow maintains its form, refusing to fall to corruption. Requires Dragon Amulet.

items.strItemName: Daggers of the Shattered Dream VIII
items.strItemDescription: Discovered in the temple of the ancient abyss, this weapon is adorned with the visage of a long forgotten Abyssal hero. Despite everything, this weapon somehow maintains its form, refusing to fall to corruption. Requires Dragon Amulet.
